name: Forest Explorer Roguelike
description:
"Forest Explorer" is a very simple roguelike/roguelite prepared during the 7-day Roguelike Jam 2021. In this game you are exploring forests and fighting monsters. Levels are randomly generated. To get to the next level you have to find a river with a boat.

Instructions

The player is controller by W/A/S/D or arrow keys.

The game is available for Linux/Windows and MacOS, as well as playable in a browser.

Credits

The game was made with Godot game engine. Programming by Kirill Diduk. The assets are mostly based on 1-bit pack from KenneyNL with some changes.
